Text: wow this one looks great. will wait to jump in .thank you. are you going to up the wolf man.

@madtown: After this one upped would be Book of Eli, 'cause I am just starting with encoding. Slight problem with Wolfie is that I have DVD, but it is very likely that BluRay would appear this week - and I prefer BR if I can get one. It is not so important, but if we can have gold, why to use silver. If I find that BR has uncertain release date, I would encode what I have - a DVD - but tomorrow. Now is late night here and I'll start encoding of Book of E. and hit the bed.

i m already downloading Shutter.Island. If there r no request 4 quark, pls skip encoding it.

@madtown: Shit happens my friend. This 6.34 GB turned to be piece of crap, I couldn't believe that video has been falling apart. I went on one place and it is true - that copy of BluRay was NUKED all over the net and it was so early in the morning that silly haven't looked all around.
Well:
order  for "nuking" is issued
"video.glitches.and.freezes_e.g.00m56s.to.01m07s_01m34s.to01m44s"
and this time was absolutely a good decision.
It means that I have "burned" 6400 Megabytes for downloading piece of crap (LOL, name of the group is HUBRIS) and I have no desire to eat someone's shit twice. Sorry, I am in bad mood now...
Shortly, there will be no BRrip of Wolfman, but I upped [quark] from DVD and - that's all I plan to do. Sorry, no better Wolfie, never ever...
